actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to clarify the definition of "vessels of the United States" in the Magnuson Fishery Conservation and Management Act.

summary.text: Amends the Magnuson Fishery Conservation and Management Act to revise the definition of "vessel of the United States" to mean a vessel built in, and documented under the laws of, the United States. (Currently, such definition requires vessels to only be documented under U.S. law.)

titles.title: A bill to clarify the definition of "vessels of the United States" in the Magnuson Fishery Conservation and Management Act.
